name: nacsacs
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wceq(cima(cfv(cmrc, c0), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈(NoeACS ` c1), c0 ∈(ACS ` c1), ((mrCls ` c0)"(P(c1)⋂ Fin))= c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wceq(cima(cfv(cmrc, c0), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0)))

⊣ (c0 ∈(NoeACS ` c1)↔(c0 ∈(ACS ` c1)∧((mrCls ` c0)"(P(c1)⋂ Fin))= c0))
